data.name: Stream Animals
data.detailed_description:
** Stream Animals Currently only works for Twitch.tv Streamers **

Stream Animals brings you closer to your streaming community. You and your viewers try to be the last one standing as the land falls into the water.

Your viewers use your streaming channel chat to decide their moves. Then the fun begins as random or voted events trigger falling blocks, player fights, or birds coming to get them!

As the last animal standing, doesn’t always mean you’re the winner. If the birds and players don’t get you, the events can still take you out!

To play, connect your Twitch account. Set up your streaming gear depending on what you use, via OBS, Streamlabs OBS, XSplit, Bebo, Wirecast, Vmix, Elgato Game Capture, or Gameshow Live. Start your stream up and bring your friends and community in to play against each other.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i5 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Computer must be able to handle streaming.
